channel.title: Trade help [pi]
channel.description:
[youtube]http://youtu.be/ypJoKXHmGb0[/youtube]
In this video after i go to shops and i close the shop i try to trade someone and it tells me close the shop before trading and i have to relog just trade and if any one knows any good tuts or how to fix thank you in advance.
skypename: zezimaa.royal and i have t.v if needed.

item.title: Trade help [pi]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Remove the code that says you have to close the shop to trade, it’s probably in shopassistant.java I’m guessing.
